issue.title: ModelListWidget doesn't display joint info if link has same name

content.raw:
`ModelListWidget` gets an entity's information by asking it to the server via an `entity_info` request message, which treats all entities equally. So when you ask for `ur10::wrist_1`, it returns the link instead of the joint simply because that was added first.

Not sure what would be the best way to get around this, it feels to me we should enforce unique entity names, because as I understand it, it would be complicated to sync `ids` between client and server.
content.html:
ModelListWidget gets an entity's information by asking it to the server via an entity_info request message, which treats all entities equally. So when you ask for ur10::wrist_1, it returns the link instead of the joint simply because that was added first.

Not sure what would be the best way to get around this, it feels to me we should enforce unique entity names, because as I understand it, it would be complicated to sync ids between client and server.
